name: shallow chocolate
description: The chocolate isn't too deep here.  With a watertight container, you could gather what looks to be pure melted cacao.  This will not be tasty.

name: deep chocolate
description: The chocolate here is deep enough to drown in.  With a watertight container, you could gather what looks to be pure melted cacao.  This will not be tasty.

name: caramel
description: An extremely hot, glowing liquid, composed of molten caramel.  In some places, caramel coated fruit is a delicacy.
